snippet.title: NORDIC ASHES: Survivors of Ragnarok - New Update Gameplay v.0.5.0
snippet.description:
Wishlist Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/20...
itchio: https://noxfall-studios.itch.io/nordi...
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/nordic-ash...

Norse themed Roguelike enemy hell, where you’ll have to survive hordes of creatures that come your way. Unlock new weapons and abilities as you battle. Upgrade your character’s stats with Constellation Ability Trees and slay your enemies before they surround you, or it may be too late…

Inspired in games like Vampire Survivors and 20 Minutes Till Dawn. Made based in the Norse Mythology and getting the best part of the Roguelike and Survivor games.

You can follow us in our social media to get the news and updates before anyone else.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NoxfallStudios
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/RhdgScwtm9

#nordicashes #roguelike #autobattle #vampiresurvivor #trailer  #gameupdate  #NoxfallStudios
